name: Cornish Knightmare
description:
This game was created in a team of 10 with a theme of 'Cornwall' and 'dreams'. The intent was to create a prototype by the deadline. In Cornish Knightmare you travel to Pendennis Castle in your dream. You discover more about the dream as the game progresses.

Controls

Move - AD / Left & Right Arrows
Jump - W / Up Arrow

Credits
